name: EXIS: The Planet Far Away
overview: A puzzle\brain game from Norman Anhut (with sound and music by Alexander Herling) where you must push all the colored spheres moved into the X marked spots. But pushing them together or against a wall piece may block your ability to push. Published in 64'er Sonderheft 79, 64'er 1999/04. The game is pretty much a science-fiction themed Sokoban clone.
